Room.Name: Leviathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Leviathan Road in the residental area of town.
Room.LongDescription: Oceancrest is kind of divided into a number of major sections. You are in the southeastern section of town, which is primarily a residental sector. There are a number of general purpose stores and small pubs for the average citizens in this area. On the east side of the road, you can see the Order of the White Rose building where Paladins go to get their basic training skills.
